dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset considers the scenario of urban scene understanding, containing real images taken by driving a car in Central European cities, with tasks including semantic segmentation, instance segmentation, and monocular depth estimation.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: Amir R Zamir
Alexander Sax
William Shen
Leonidas J Guibas
Jitendra Malik
Silvio Savarese
dcterms:description: The Taskonomy dataset contains semi-real images of indoor scenes, annotated for 26 tasks including dense prediction and classification tasks, selected to be diverse while keeping the total number of tasks reasonable.
dcterms:title: Taskonomy

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Ping Luo
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
dcterms:description: The CelebA dataset contains over 200k images of celebrities, labeled with 40 facial attribute categories, treating the prediction of each attribute as a binary classification task.
dcterms:title: CelebA
